params.name: test_self
params.description: pass true to include the element itself in the scan

getAncestorByTagName.description: Searches for an ancestor by tag name. This is significantly faster than using Y.node.ancestor('tagname').

params.name: test_self
params.description: pass true to include the element itself in the scan

getAncestorByClassName.description: Searches for an ancestor by class name. This is significantly faster than using Y.node.ancestor('.classname'), and it accepts a regular expression.

params.name: fn
params.description: selector string or boolean method for testing elements

params.name: test_self
params.description: pass true to include the element itself in the scan

ancestor.description: Patch to speed up search for a single class name or single tag name. To use a regular expression, call getAncestorByClassName().

params.name: fn
params.description: selector string or boolean method for testing elements

params.name: test_self
params.description: pass true to include the element itself in the scan

all.description: Patch to speed up search for a single class name or single tag name. To use a regular expression, call getElementsByClassName().

params.name: tag_name
params.description: optional tag name to filter by

getElementsByClassName.description: Searches for descendants by class name. Unlike Y.all(), this function accepts a regular expression.
